app.core.entrypoint package¶

Submodules¶

app.core.entrypoint.create_env module¶

class app.core.entrypoint.create_env.CreateEnv(config_path: str)¶

Bases: object

A class used to encrypt configuration data and write it to an environment file. Use it to deploy your application without show your config.json.

config_path¶

The file path to the configuration data.

Type:

str

env_path¶

The file path to the environment file.

Type:

str

Methods

decrypt(key, config_encrypted)

Decrypts the encrypted config data with the given key.

run()

Encrypts the config data and writes it to the environment file.
decrypt(key: str, config_encrypted: str)¶

Decrypts the encrypted config data with the given key.

Parameters:

  • key (str) – The encryption key.

  • config_encrypted (str) – The encrypted configuration data.

Returns:

The decrypted configuration data.

Return type:

dict

run()¶

Encrypts the config data and writes it to the environment file.

app.core.entrypoint.json_api module¶

class app.core.entrypoint.json_api.JsonAPI(version: Versions = Versions())¶

Bases: object

A class for creating JSON payloads for player events in a game.

version¶

An instance of the Versions class storing various version details.

Type:

Versions
